MAN.TITLE: set_posfig_dim
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: change defaut transformation for exporting in postscript

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : graphic figure width, number of pixels
: graphic figure height, number of pixels

DESCRIPTION.P: set_posfig_dim(w,h) set the coordinates transformation to be used when exporting a graphic window in postscript. The graphic figure zoomed with ratios w/<graphic figure width> horizontally and h/<graphic figure height> vertically.

This function is particularily useful when one wants an export a graphic figure exactly as it is shown on the screen. For that w and h has to be set respectively to <graphic figure width> and <graphic figure height>
set_posfig_dim(0,0) resets the default values: w=600, h=424.
